author: CS
title: 74th Golden Globes Red Carpet Photos
text:
SHARE 74th Golden Globes red carpet photos 
Jimmy Fallon is hosting the 74th Annual Golden Globes on Sunday night, but before the show kicked off, the stars walked the red carpet and weâ€™ve got photos! You can view the Golden Globes red carpet photos using the gallery below. 
You can check out the full list of winners and nominees by clicking here . 
Produced by dick clark productions in association with the HFPA, the Golden Globe Awards are viewed in more than 236 countries worldwide and are one of the few awards ceremonies to include both motion picture and television achievements. Lorenzo Soria is President of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association. Allen Shapiro, CEO of dick clark productions; Mike Mahan, President of dick clark productions; and Barry Adelman, Executive VP of Television at dick clark productions, will serve as executive producers.
